channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Spotify says Wrapped 2025 is its biggest yet, with 200M+ users in its first day
item.description: After last year's flop, Spotify Wrapped engagement is up 19% and shares were up 41%, the company says.

item.title: Quelle version de la Renault 5 E-Tech choisir en 2025 ? Notre guide comparatif complet (moteur, batterie, finitions, options)
item.description: Vous êtes intéressé pour acheter une R5 électrique de Renault mais vous ne savez pas laquelle choisir ? Moteurs, batteries, finitions, options : on passe tout au crible pour vous recommander le meilleur choix. Voici notre guide complet sur les différentes versions de la Renault 5 E-Tech.

item.title: The best robot vacuums
item.description: Robot vacuums are impressive devices that will clean your floors well and — thanks to bigger batteries and better robot brains — rarely get tired of doing their job. Over the last few years, these floor-sweeping bots have gone from utilitarian devices to full-fledged home robots that vacuum and mop your home, clean themselves, and […]

item.title: I’m a marathoner and a cybersecurity leader — Here’s what 26.2 miles have taught me about work
item.description: Lessons from long-distance racing that help cybersecurity leaders push through the toughest challenges.

item.title: Amazon n’hésite pas à baisser le prix des emblématiques AirPods Pro 2 suite à la sortie de la nouvelle génération
item.description: Les AirPods Pro 2 version USB-C sont les écouteurs intra-auriculaires phares d'Apple avec ANC et puce H2 à retrouver pour 190,09 euros sur Amazon au lieu de 299 euros.

item.title: Proton now has an end-to-end encrypted spreadsheet app
item.description: Proton has added a new privacy-focused spreadsheet app to its productivity suite to tempt users over from Google and Microsoft’s platforms. The new Proton Sheets tool provides real-time collaboration features and end-to-end encryption, according to Proton’s announcement, “ensuring that no one else, not even Proton, can access your spreadsheet and the information it contains.” A […]...

item.title: Dreame's new mop-swapping robot vacuum is the most innovative and ambitious robovac I've ever tested
item.description: The Dreame Matrix10 Ultra might be the perfect bot for big, complex homes or even commercial properties.

item.title: AI browsers are rewriting the rules. Is your security keeping pace?
item.description: Agentic AI browsers enable sophisticated attacks through prompt injections that steal credentials without detection traces.

item.title: Walton Goggins Would Rather Spend Hours in ‘Fallout’ Ghoul Makeup Than Any Time in Power Armor
item.description: The giant, hulking suits of the Brotherhood of Steel on Amazon's 'Fallout' adaptation can either make you feel good... or feel very bad.

item.title: Sebastien Lecornu, le matcha et la Coupe du monde des clubs : découvrez les mots les plus recherchés sur Google en 2025
item.description: Chaque année Google publie les termes les plus recherchés sur son navigateur de recherche. Divisé en plusieurs catégories, ce récapitulatif permet de dresser un tableau des tendances françaises 2025.

item.title: InnAIO AI Translator T10 Review: Feature-Loaded but Needs Work
item.description: The InnAIO T10 clips magnetically to the back of your phone, but it needs further development to be worth the money.

item.title: The 25 best gifts for travelers who are always on the move
item.description: I'm convinced that whoever said it's about the journey, not the destination, has never traveled. Try sitting on a plane for 16 hours - plus delays, airport security, and a snoring seat neighbor - and then get back to me. While getting from point A to point B can feel like a test of endurance, […]

item.title: Anthropic’s quest to study the negative effects of AI is under pressure
item.description: Today, I’m talking with Verge senior AI reporter Hayden Field about some of the people responsible for studying AI and deciding in what ways it might… well, ruin the world. Those folks work at Anthropic as part of a group called the societal impacts team, which Hayden just spent time with for a profile she […]

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Friday, December 5 (game #908)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Microsoft quietly patches LNK vulnerability that's been weaponized for years
item.description: The November Patch Tuesday fixed an age-old bug being exploited by nation-states.

item.title: Apple a discrètement supprimé une fonction photo historique sur les iPhone 17 Pro
item.description: Apple a discrètement — et sans prévenir — supprimé une fonction photo sur les iPhone 17 Pro qui avait fait son apparition sur l'iPhone 12 Pro. Il n'est plus possible de combiner le mode Portrait avec le mode Nuit sur les nouveaux modèles.

item.title: Proton launches new end-to-end encrypted spreadhseets for ultra secure data handling
item.description: Proton Drive now has Docs and Sheets to ensure maximum data security across key workflows.

item.description: A Samsung leak seems to have revealed new models and sizes

item.title: Russia bans Roblox over ‘LGBT propaganda’ and ‘extremist’ content
item.description: Russia is restricting access to Roblox after the country’s communications regulator Roskomnadzor accused it of promoting extremism and “LGBT propaganda,” according to reports from Reuters and Meduza. As reported by Meduza, Russian lawmakers began raising concerns about Roblox days after The Guardian published a report about the platform last month, detailing how the author was […]...

item.title: « Super Lune froide » : dernière chance de l’année… voici les infos à connaître pour ne rien manquer
item.description: Elle fait la Une de tous les médias. La super Lune froide qui illuminera le ciel cette nuit. Faut-il vraiment s’attendre à un spectacle exceptionnel ?

item.title: Start 2026 strong - you can save up to 50% on Wix’s top apps right now
item.description: Over 450 of Wix’s best apps are on sale right now, with discounts ranging from 20% to 50%

item.title: « Les cellules sont catastrophiques » : ces batteries Tesla produites en Chine inquiètent
item.description: Un réparateur expert juge les batteries Tesla fabriquées en Chine « catastrophiques » face aux versions américaines et européennes. Usure précoce, réparation impossible... Faut-il s'inquiéter ?

item.title: Amazon casse le prix de la Garmin Vivoactive 6, une montre idéale pour la course à pied
item.description: La Vivoactive 6 est une montre efficace pour le suivi sportif, sans avoir l'air pour autant d'une montre de sport. Sobre et élégante, cette montre offre une analyse fiable de la fréquence cardiaque et un GPS plutôt correct. Si elle vous intéresse, sachez qu'elle est en promotion à 258 euros contre 329 euros de base.

item.title: Antigravity A1 Review: There’s Nothing Else Like This 360 Camera Drone
item.description: The Antigravity A1 drone offers an experience akin to being in a glass orb hovering 500 meters above the earth.

item.title: Booster la RAM de votre PC Linux sans rien dépenser : voici l’astuce zRAM
item.description: Saviez-vous qu'Android utilise une astuce appelée "mémoire virtuelle" pour gonfler ses fiches techniques ? Sur Linux, ça s'appelle zRAM, et c'est bien plus qu'un argument marketing. En compressant les données directement dans la mémoire vive, vous évitez d'écrire sur votre disque dur et boostez les performances.

item.title: The 19 Best Golf Gifts for Every Kind of Golfer (2025)
item.description: Make your favorite golfer’s day with the best golf gifts to enhance every part of their game.

item.title: Missed Black Friday? Fear not, as PS Plus members can still get an extra 5% off at PS Direct – including sale items
item.description: You can get an extra 5% off with PS Plus at PS Direct in the UK.

item.title: Anthropic signs $200M deal to bring its LLMs to Snowflake’s customers
item.description: AI research lab Anthropic inked a $200 million deal with Snowflake to bring its AI models to Snowflake's 12,600 customers.

item.title: This DDoS group just smashed the previous record with a 29.7 Tbps attack
item.description: Aisuru is back on the headlines again, breaking new DDoS records.

item.title: Don't buy a PC until you see this £315 Core Ultra 7 with 1TB SSD and 16GB RAM — MSI cuts 60% off Claw handheld gaming console amidst Cyber Monday clear-out
item.description: This gaming handheld console is technically a mini PC and it has no rival even at twice the price

item.title: Pénurie de RAM : ce « cartel » de la mémoire a décidé de vous faire payer le prix fort jusqu’en 2028
item.description: C'est une douche froide pour le monde du hardware. Alors que la demande explose, les géants de la mémoire vive refusent d'augmenter la cadence. Et en plus, Micron abandonne le grand public en supprimant Crucial. L'objectif ? Tout miser sur l'IA et les data centers, au détriment de votre PC.

item.title: Nvidia’s new RTX 50-series GPU driver restores PhysX support for popular games
item.description: Nvidia launched its first RTX 50-series graphics cards earlier this year without support for PhysX, the GPU-accelerated technology that let games realistically simulate shattering glass, moving liquids, smoke, fog, and more. Now, Nvidia is bringing back PhysX support for the RTX 50-series GPUs for top-played games like Borderlands 2, Mirror’s Edge, and Batman: Arkham City. […]...

item.title: Google Chrome s’inspire de Vivaldi et ajoute cette fonction attendue
item.description: Il est désormais possible d'améliorer sa productivité sur Google Chrome en affichant simultanément deux onglets.

item.title: Who Is This Mysterious ‘South African Tech Billionaire’ in Olivia Nuzzi’s New Book?
item.description: Everyone's focused on what the book says about the RFK Jr. scandal. But one of its more bizarre elements, is what it doesn't say.

item.title: Yahoo is using AI to recap football games in real time
item.description: It's about to be week 14 of the NFL season, and stakes and storylines abound across the league. In a new section of the Yahoo Sports app, Yahoo is hoping it can use AI to capture them all automatically. The company is launching a new feature called Game Breakdowns, which attempt to generate a snapshot […]

item.title: EU investigating Meta over policy change that bans rival AI chatbots from WhatsApp
item.description: The European Commission is is launching an antitrust investigation into Meta's move to ban other AI companies from using WhatsApp's business tools to offer their own AI chatbots to users.

item.title: Inside the NYSE’s surprising partnership with TBPN, the LA-based video podcast dominating tech media
item.description: The exchange’s latest media partnership extends its push into new formats while giving TBPN a high-profile East Coast home base. If you combine the NYSE and TBPN, do you get a BFD? Apparently.

item.title: Klarna takes on Amex Platinum and Chase Sapphire with premium perks that don’t require a credit card
item.description: The Swedish fintech’s new tiers offer luxury travel perks, lounge access, cash back, and subscriptions as more Americans shift toward BNPL. As Americans grapple with $1.23 trillion in credit card balances, Klarna Group is introducing a new way to access premium rewards—one that doesn’t require a credit card at all.

item.title: Antigravity A1 Review: A 360-Degree Drone
item.description: The Antigravity A1 is fun all around, if you don’t mind the steep price or wearing goggles to control it.

item.title: AI finds its way into Apple’s top apps of the year
item.description: Although Apple has continued to avoid naming a dedicated AI app or AI chatbot as its app of the year, AI was showcased among this year's winners.

item.title: I tested the Antigravity 360 drone – and only a sky-high price tag brings this unique DJI rival down to earth
item.description: The Antigravity A1 is an innovative 360-degree drone that uses FPV goggles and a motion controller for an immersive experience while capturing up to 8K video.

item.title: Apple reveals the 17 must-download apps of 2025 – the App Store Award winners are here
item.description: Apple’s 2025 App Store Award Winners highlight 17 standout apps that showcase the year’s surge in AI, design, and cross-platform innovation on the iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, Apple TV, and Apple Vision Pro.

item.title: Sony reveals new steampunk fantasy RPG The God Slayer for PS5, Xbox, and PC as part of the company's China Hero Project
item.description: Sony has announced The God Slayer, a new steampunk fantasy role-playing game (RPG) from the My Time at Portia studio Pathea Games.

item.title: Review: Is Insta360s Antigravity A1 drone the DJI replacement weve been hoping for?
item.description: Insta360's highly anticipated Antigravity A1 drone is finally here. We tested the 360-degree 3K camera drone to see if it flies over the competition.

item.title: Antigravity launches 8K 360-degree camera drone and its a delight to fly
item.description: Antigravity has launched launched Antigravity A1, saying it's the "world's first" consumer aerial drone with inbuilt 360-degree video capture.

item.title: Nvidia GeForce Now en décembre 2025 : la synchronisation Battle.net arrive, avec une promotion et une trentaine de nouveaux jeux !
item.description: Pour la fin de l'année, Nvidia GeForce Now met les petits plats dans les grands. Pour commencer, c'est un ensemble de 30 jeux qui rejoint la ludothèque de la plateforme de cloud gaming. Sans compter cette nouveauté qui facilite la vie à celles et ceux qui ont un compte Battle.net.

item.title: Test de l’Antigravity A1 : le drone qui filme tout, pour que vous n’ayez plus à cadrer
item.description: Insta360, pardon, Antigravity, se lance sur le marché des drones de loisir avec l’A1, le tout premier drone à filmer à 360°. Le fabricant grille ainsi la politesse à DJI et chamboule un marché innovant, mais légèrement ronronnant. Ce drone grand public offre une expérience immersive révolutionnaire qui permet de capturer des images depuis le ciel comme jamais auparavant. ...

item.title: Ce drone FPV 360 degrés débarque en France et filme absolument tout autour de vous
item.description: Antigravity lance aujourd'hui son premier drone à 360 degrés, l'Antigravity A1, qui se pilote grâce à un casque FPV.

item.title: Voici les meilleures applications sur iPhone, iPad et Mac d’après Apple en 2025
item.description: Chaque année, Apple décerne des prix aux meilleures applications publiées sur son App Store. Voici les gagnants en 2025.

item.title: This color-changing E Ink guitar absolutely rocks, and I wish I could afford it
item.description: What do you get if you cross an electric guitar with a Kindle?

item.title: Plus puissant et plus joli : portrait robot du futur iPhone 17e
item.description: L'iPhone 16e a plusieurs atouts en poche pour séduire les consommateurs : de la puissance à revendre, un bel écran, et un rapport qualité prix relativement équilibré. Apple a manifestement trouvé la bonne formule, car un iPhone 17e serait déjà sur les rails pour un lancement au printemps prochain. Et le constructeur en profiterait pour rapprocher le design du futur modèle avec les versions plus haut de gamme....

item.title: This new poll shows Obamacare enrollees are struggling, as premiums are set to surge
item.description: Enhanced premium tax credits are set to expire at the end of 2025 and have been at the center of tensions in Congress. Fifty-two-year-old Dinam Bigny sank into debt and had to get a roommate this year, in part because of health insurance premiums that cost him nearly $900 per month.Next year, those monthly fees will rise by $200 — a significant enough increase that the program manager in Aldie, Virginia, has resigned himself to finding cheaper coverage.“I won’t be able to pay it, because I really drained out any savings that I have right now,” he said. “Emergency fund is still draining out — t...

item.title: Googles Year in Search 2025: The most interesting part is how we searched
item.description: Google's annual review of search trends is here.

item.title: Arnaque à l’investissement crypto : un réseau de fraude fait des « milliers de victimes » en Europe
item.description: Un vaste réseau européen d’arnaques à l’investissement crypto vient d’être neutralisé par Europol. Après plusieurs coups de filet, la police a mis un terme aux activités des escrocs.

item.title: Pantone’s 2026 Color of the Year is visual tofu
item.description: In an era when every color is in all the time, where do you even go next? Pantone has a suggestion. Since Pantone began naming its Color of the Year in 2000, we’ve seen two flavors of both brown and yellow, three variations of purple, blue, and turquoise, and four distinct takes on orange.
